steps.name: Given I am login on staging env by created timestamp project
Debug step:
When I navigate to menu "Mobile app" with submenu "Mobile Editor"
Then I should see Mobile screen display
When I select tab list with name "Pages"
When I select tab name Pages with index 1
When I add new screen with name JIT016d
Then I should see the screen with name JIT016d display in list Pages
When I select screen with name JIT016d
When I select tab list with name "Layers"
When I open Search popup on item value "JIT016d" with index "1"
When I add item "View" without inputting in Search popup to preview mobile editor
Then I should see the preview mobile editor match with image title "JIT008.Search.Components.View"
Diff:
When I select item value "View" with index "1"
When I update field label "Width" of header "Basic" with radio "%" and value "100"
When I update field label "Height" of header "Basic" with radio "PX" and value "300"
When I open Search popup on item value "View" with index "1"
When I add item "View" without inputting in Search popup to preview mobile editor
When I toggle on item value "View" with index "1"
When I select item value "View" with index "2"
When I select the color for field label "Background Color" of header "Background" by inputting the hexcode value "FF0000"
When I update margin-padding id "marginTop" of header "Spacing" with value "10"
When I update margin-padding id "marginBottom" of header "Spacing" with value "10"
When I update margin-padding id "marginLeft" of header "Spacing" with value "10"
When I update margin-padding id "marginRight" of header "Spacing" with value "10"
When I select item value "View" with index "1"
When I select field label "Flex Direction" of header "Layout" with radio "row-reverse"
